lotr.menu.title: The Lord of the Rings Mod: Bringing Middle-earth to Minecraft - Renewed
lotr.menu.subtitle: A work-in-progress update to Minecraft 1.15
death.attack.lotr.plant: %s hath been slain by a plant
death.attack.lotr.stalagmite: %s hath been spiked by a sharp rock
chat.lotr.res_pack_warning: %s: Warning: Thy mod resources art setteth to base'r priority than default resources. This shall breaketh some features of the mod, such as v'rtical slabs. To fix this, go to Thy Wishes... -> Resource Packs... and put 'Mod Resources' above 'Default'.
